page.title: 10Homes in St.Helens
page.content: Like most other places,St.Helens has many different types of housing.Near to the centre of the town there are a lot of terraced houses.These are joined together in a row,with up to twenty houses,or sometimes more,in one long block.They usually have a back yard opening onto an entry.Not many have front gardens. Further away from the centre there are houses and bungalows.These are sometimes detached while others are only semi-detached.They usually have a garden at both back and front.They often have a garage at the side of the house.Most of these houses and bungalows have three bedrooms,although some of these are very small. Not everyone owns their own home many rent their house from St.Helens Council.
